sections.MISSION:
Comanche conducts GTA 500 NLT 100019JUN2024 on the Grafenwöhr Training Area in order to build driver proficiency and to stress test vehicles for Troop STX
Commander’s
sections.PURPOSE: of this is to identify any faults with Comanche Troop's vehicles.​
sections.KEY TASKS:
PCC/PCI/PMCS License and Dispatch book inspection Safety and Recovery Equipment checks COMMEX
Complete two laps around GTA
Communicate on move via SINGARS
Execute wash rack operations
sections.END STATE:
Training: Drivers proficiency, Leaders proficiency, Comms on move reporting
Equipment: Test all equipment, all deficiencies annotated on 5988’s and verified by mechanics
Training Objectives
Identify Commex issues
Build drivers confidence
Stress test vehicles
Resourcing
OIC: LT Conner NCOIC: SSG Bullard
POC: LT Grant Conner; grant.t.conner.mil@army.mil
COA: 12 1300 JUN 2024
1/2 CR MP
staging
GTA 500 Macro Route
The movement will be conducted at the platoon level. The order of movement will be 1st, 2nd, then 3rd. Once the lead platoon reaches CP 1, the following Platoon will begin movement. On the second lap, the platoon will stop at the wash station at Grafenwohr before continuing back to the motor pool.
